articles.description: The High Street chain is trialling moving its self-serve goods to crack down on shoplifting.
articles.title: Greggs shifts food behind counters to stop shoplifting

articles.description: The deal covers defence, trade, fishing, and a possible youth scheme, in the first big reset since Brexit.
articles.title: UK-EU deal moves on from Brexit rows, Starmer says

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: His years as a BBC host end in circumstances nobody would have wanted, but some might have predicted.
articles.title: Gary Lineker: A sorry end to a BBC career

articles.description: He will no longer present the corporation's future coverage of the FA Cup and World Cup as planned.
articles.title: Gary Lineker to leave BBC after social media 'error'

articles.description: The deal paves the way for more common ground with the EU, but only dismantles a fraction of the trade barriers erected post-Brexit.
articles.title: Will UK-EU deal mean 'huge' boost for economic growth?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A woman dons a bread mask and launches social media campaign to win a battle over a parking ticket.
articles.title: Zoe Bread's TikTok campaign forces council to refund parking fines

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The former US president has been diagnosed with an aggressive form of prostate cancer that has spread to his bones, his office says.
articles.title: Cancer touches us all, says Biden after outpouring of support

articles.description: The EU-UK trade deal has been praised as a "leap foward" and "genuine progress" by some of the UK's major business groups.
articles.title: Morrisons says UK-EU deal will 'ease' price pressure

articles.title: The new UK-EU deal at a glance

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: David Ejimofor, 15, told friends he couldn't swim before entering the water, an inquest hears.
articles.title: Teen who drowned at Aberavon could not swim, inquest hears
